original_title: Black Beauty. A Cinematic Short Film
overview: “Black Beauty” a project I worked on for BHM. A film and photos that celebrates how proud I am to be a black photographer documenting beautiful black women and men and our culture 🫶🏿 thank you to everyone involved. Share this with ya friends and family. Being a photographer goes beyond just taking cool photos for me so it’s really means a lot to share this project with y’all. - @vuhlandes
title: Black Beauty. A Cinematic Short Film
